description: *What new? Check further down.* Showing 50 random quotes from bash.org! Fun fun fun, low data consumption and best, LIEBL Software is bringing you this APP for free. If you don't know bash.org yet here is an explenation since to many people complaint about very offensive quotes. These quotes were deliverd by people who use IRC or smiliar Chat software and should not be taken serious in any way! Most people there don't have a RL. If you don't know what RL means you shouldn't use this App. In the premium version (release date is 19 of August 2010) you will be able to rate post bad or good or even report them cause of violation or any other inaceptable content. Alot of more features will be aviable. Stay tuned if interested ;). *This Update will fix the 'load problem of quotes' or better will simply scroll you up again each Quote because there is no loading error.*
